t: “How*pn you have helped the powerless! How*ld you have saved the arm that is feeble!
What*ln advice you have offered to one without wisdom! And*ld what great insight you have displayed!
Who*ln has helped you utter these words? And*ld whose spirit spoke from your mouth?
“The*pn dead are in deep anguish, those*ld beneath the waters and all that live in them.
The*ln realm of the dead is naked before God; Destruction*ld lies uncovered.
He*ln spreads out the northern skies over empty space; he*ld suspends the earth over nothing.
He*ln wraps up the waters in his clouds, yet*ld the clouds do not burst under their weight.
He*ln covers the face of the full moon, spreading*ld his clouds over it.
He*ln marks out the horizon on the face of the waters for*ld a boundary between light and darkness.
The*ln pillars of the heavens quake, aghast*ld at his rebuke.
By*ln his power he churned up the sea; by*ld his wisdom he cut Rahab to pieces.
By*ln his breath the skies became fair; his*ld hand pierced the gliding serpent.
And*ln these are but the outer fringe of his works; how*ld faint the whisper we hear of him! Who*ld then can understand the thunder of his power?”
